00034 VariabilityScoreCelListener::VariabilityScoreCelListener(std::vector<ProbeListPacked>& probeSets, 
00035                                                          QCProbesetOptions& psOpts,
00036                                                          ChipLayout* layout, 
00037                                                          const std::string& label) :
00038   m_ProbeSets(probeSets),
00039   m_psOpts(psOpts),
00040   m_layout(layout),
00041   m_Label(label)
00042 {
00043   Verbose::out(2, "Initializing Multichannel VariabilityScoreCelListener Okay!");
00044 
00045   declareMetric(m_Label+"_CV_GC",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00046   declareMetric(m_Label+"_CV_AT",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00047 }

00049 /** 
00050  * Loop though an open cel file and fill in the statistics for each
00051  * probe subset.
00052  * 
00053  * @param masks - Different probe subsets to calculate stats for.
00054  * @param cel - Cel file to get data from.
00055  * @param chipStats - Vector to fill in with stats for each mask.
00056  */
00057 void 
00058 VariabilityScoreCelListener::calcStats(vector<ProbeListPacked>& probeSets, 
00059                                        affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData* cel,
00060                                        CumulativeStats<double> &chipStats, 
00061                                        int channel)
00062 {
00063   Verbose::out(4, "Total probesets to compute D_Score: " + ToStr(probeSets.size()));
00064   for (int i=0; i<probeSets.size(); i++) {
00065     //float Min, Max; //## turn off V-score
00066     float mean, std;
00067     ProbeSet *ps = ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(probeSets[i]);
00068     //probesetMinMax(cel, ps, Min, Max); //## turn off V-score, min max cal;
00069 
00070     probesetMeanStd(cel, ps, mean, std);
00071     //For debug only
00072     //Verbose::out(4, "probesetname: " + ToStr(ps->name) + "; mean: " + ToStr(mean)
00073     //   + ";std: " + ToStr(std));
00074     double cv_score = std/mean;
00075     // chipStats1.addData(d_score); //## turn off V-score
00076     chipStats.addData(cv_score);    
00077 
00078 
00079     // double d_score = (Max-Min)/(Max+Min); //##turn ooff V-score
00080     //Verbose::out(4, ToStr(ps->name)+":"+ToStr(channel)+","+ToStr(Min)+","+ToStr(Max)+","+ToStr(d_score));
00081     chipStats.addData(cv_score);
00082     Freez(ps);
00083   }
00084 }
00085 
00086 /** 
00087  * Loop though an open cel file and fill in the statistics for each
00088  * probe subset.
00089  * 
00090  * @param masks - Different probe subsets to calculate stats for.
00091  * @param cel - Cel file to get data from.
00092  * @param chipStats - Vector to fill in with stats for each mask.
00093  */
00094 void VariabilityScoreCelListener::calcStats(vector<ProbeListPacked>& probeSets, 
00095                                             affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData* cel,
00096                                             CumulativeStats<double>& chipStats1, 
00097                                             CumulativeStats<double>& chipStats2, 
00098                                             int channel)
00099 {
00100   Verbose::out(4, "Total probesets to compute D_Score: " + ToStr(probeSets.size()));
00101   for (int i=0; i<probeSets.size(); i++){
00102     float Min, Max, mean, std;
00103     ProbeSet *ps = ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(probeSets[i]);
00104     probesetMinMax(cel, ps, Min, Max);
00105     probesetMeanStd(cel, ps, mean, std);
00106     //For debug only
00107     //Verbose::out(4, "probesetname: " + ToStr(ps->name) + "; mean: " + ToStr(mean)
00108     //   + ";std: " + ToStr(std));
00109     double d_score = (Max-Min)/(Max+Min);
00110     double cv_score = std/mean;
00111     chipStats1.addData(d_score);
00112     chipStats2.addData(cv_score);
00113     Freez(ps);
00114   }
00115 }

00117 /*
00118  * Cel file of data.
00119  *
00120  * @param cel - Handle to an open cel phone.
00121  */
00122 
00123 void VariabilityScoreCelListener::newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel) {
00124   m_CelNames.push_back(cel->GetFileName());
00125 
00126   const int channel_cnt=2;
00127         std::vector<std::wstring> channel_names = cel->GetChannels();
00128 
00129   std::vector<double> medians; // medians[channel] V_score
00130   std::vector<double> medians2; // medians2[channel] CV_score
00131   medians.resize(channel_cnt);
00132   medians2.resize(channel_cnt);
00133 
00134   // std::vector<CumulativeStats<double> > chipStats;
00135   // chipStats.resize(channel_cnt);
00136   std::vector<CumulativeStats<double> > chipStats2;
00137   chipStats2.resize(channel_cnt);
00138 
00139   Verbose::out(4, "calculating medians for "+ ToStr(cel->GetFileName()));
00140  
00141   for (int channel = 0; channel<channel_cnt; channel++) {
00142     cel->SetActiveDataGroup(channel_names[channel]);
00143 
00144 //    chipStats[channel].setFull();
00145 //    calcStats(m_ProbeSets, cel, chipStats[channel], channel);
00146 //    chipStats[channel].setUpFullMethod();
00147 //    medians[channel] = chipStats[channel].getMedian();
00148 
00149     //chipStats[channel].setFull(); //turning off V-score method
00150     chipStats2[channel].setFull(); //turning on FULL method
00151 
00152     // old, turn off V-score
00153     // calcStats(m_ProbeSets, &CEL, chipStats[channel], channel);
00154     // dual cal, V and CV score
00155     // calcStats(m_ProbeSets, &CEL, chipStats[channel], chipStats2[channel],channel); 
00156 
00157     calcStats(m_ProbeSets, cel, chipStats2[channel],channel);  //CV_score only
00158     //chipStats[channel].setUpFullMethod();  //## turn off V_score
00159     chipStats2[channel].setUpFullMethod();   
00160     //medians[channel] = chipStats[channel].getMedian(); //## turn off V_score
00161     medians2[channel] = chipStats2[channel].getMedian();
00162   }
00163 
00164   int chipIx=getNextChipIdx();
00165 
00166   // setMetric(chipIx,m_Label+"_GC_V",medians[1]);
00167   // setMetric(chipIx,m_Label+"_AT_V",medians[0]);
00168   setMetric(chipIx,m_Label+"_CV_AT", medians2[1]);
00169   setMetric(chipIx,m_Label+"_CV_GC", medians2[0]);
00170 
00171   ///@todo option to report other metrics?
00172   setValid(true);
00173 }
